alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 11:17PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pasco, north central Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1117 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keystone, or 8 miles southeast of New Port Richey, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, New Port Richey, Lutz, Holiday, Hillsborough River State Park, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Land O Lakes, Egypt Lake-Leto, Greater Carrollwood, University, Keystone, Greater Northdale, East Lake, Pebble Creek, Citrus Park, Lake Magdalene, New Port Richey East, and Palm River-Clair Mel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
